attributes.action: help English people, by extending health action plans made in Scotland south of the border,where relevant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been some good health campaigns in Scotland, supported by their parliament. An example of these is Ryan McLaughlin's "Shine on Scotland" campaign about the benefits vitamin D supplements.

We do not have a parliament for England, so campaigners cannot get as much support as Scotland has over this kind of issue.

Please support my petition for scottish parliament health action ideas to be extended south of the border, if they could benefit English people.

Maybe health action plans in any country of the UK could be shared?
